import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import './print.css'; import { DataTable } from 'primereact/datatable'; import moment from 'moment'; import { Column } from 'primereact/column'; import { UserProfileContext } from '../../App'; export const FormPrint = (props) => { const userProfile = useContext(UserProfileContext); const { data, payment, store } = props; return (
